title: Real-Time Engagement Strategies in Synchronous Online Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment evaluates the application of scientific principles, with emphasis on real-time interaction using digital collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners achieve cognitive engagement (question generation, concept linking) on science topics at a frequency of over 80% using Zoom's real-time polling/whiteboard features in synchronous online environments
Learners visualize science experiment data using digital tools like Desmos and demonstrate social presence (feedback provision, idea sharing) through collaborative activities at least three times
Learners record emotional engagement (expressing curiosity, sharing feelings) at least five times during science problem-solving processes via real-time chat and voice discussions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
